abstract: Cardinal Edward M Egan is fondly remembered by parishioners at Chapel of the Sacred Hearts of Jesus and Mary in Manhattan's Kips Bay neighborhood, where Egan retired in 2009 to second-floor residence.
lead_paragraph: To parishioners of the Chapel of the Sacred Hearts of Jesus and Mary on East 33rd Street, where he retired in 2009, Cardinal Edward M. Egan was known as a good-humored man with a weakness for pineapples.

headline.main: Cardinal Egan Is Recalled Fondly at a Chapel He Called Home
headline.print_headline: Egan Is Recalled Fondly at Chapel He Called Home
